title: Create demo script
description:
Step-by-step demo walkthrough for judges.

## Demo Script (3-5 minutes)

### Opening (30s)
"Ecommerce brands waste 20-30% of ad spend because they can't see what's working until it's too late. Meet Agatha - she finds the money you're leaving on the table."

### The Hook (30s)
"In the next 60 seconds, Agatha will analyze this brand's $300k monthly ad spend and find optimization opportunities."

### Live Demo (2 min)
1. Login via Meta OAuth
2. Select TL account
3. Click "Analyze" - show loading
4. REVEAL: "Agatha found $152k in opportunities!"
5. Show recommendations:
   - "$88k wasted on TikTok (0 ROAS) - PAUSE"
   - "$212k performer at 29x ROAS - SCALE 30%"
6. Approve recommendations
7. Execute - show confirmation

### Close (30s)
"Agatha identified $150k+ in opportunities in under 60 seconds. That's the power of AI-driven ad optimization."

## Fallback
- Pre-recorded video if live demo fails
- BigQuery backup if Meta API fails
